thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 48 of 7211
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I have purchased several items through B&H. I have found their service to be exceptional. They have customer service that you can easily reach. Their expedited delivery is great, especially if you have a short deadline (which I have). Their return policy is very fair and hassle free.They offer the top notch service that I would expect from an exceptional organization.
